title:
I have asked this question in the past and this has not been answered? 



Why does Carolina Beach Police Department have to break the law and run window tint so dark that you can not see the Officer in the vehicle? Other agencies don\'t put that dark of tint on the windows where you can\'t see the patrol officer!
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=3012
